body:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[$TableName$](
	[$ColumnName$ID] [INT] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[$ColumnName$Kodu] varchar(50) NOT NULL,
	[$ColumnName$Adi] varchar(100) NULL,
	[AddDate] [SMALLDATETIME] NULL DEFAULT(GETDATE()),
	[AddUser] [INT] NULL DEFAULT(dbo.F15_GetActivePersonelID(-1))
 CONSTRAINT [PK_$TableName$] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[$ColumnName$ID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
GO
CREATE UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_$TableName$] ON [dbo].[$TableName$]
(
	[$ColumnName$Kodu] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
GO
